column1: karen-hopp-09643b93,Karen,Hopp,"English language trainer at British Language Training Centre

,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D03AQHPn539SD-Ycg/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0/1588475026479?e=1697673600&v=beta&t=0GZ0N1QiotmUDy4cGtl8p26N9CljbSNZyNpFXApcOpg,,personal,ACoAABPR3bIBwcX2KOk6msHPMLnIqIVCIqMfrVk,332520882,,A dynamic and dedicated English language trainer and Cambridge examiner with over 25 years of experience teaching international clients from many different fields of business.

column2: Initial analysis of client’s needs and setting of goals
Organising and delivering tailor-made seminars for one to one & small groups of middle and senior management according to business sector and level of language competence
Directing seminars of specific business skills for high level management
Planning and teaching intensive courses for English for specific purposes
Teaching English to groups of up to 12 students of different nationalities
Coordinating levels and needs for maximum progress
Researching and creating specific materials relevant to professional
Assisting in the running of a fully equipped multimedia resource centre
Preparation of exams and Cambridge examiner – FCE, CAE, CPE, BEC, IELTS
Report writing and mapping out future recommendations for individual
